Preconditions.Precondition: The Customer is not logged on to the system

FlowElement.Step: The use case begins when the Customer selects "New Customer".
The system asks the Customer to enter a user name and password.
The Customer enters the requested information.
The system checks to see if the user name is available and the password is valid.

While.condition: the username is not available or the password is invalid

WhileElement.Step: The system asks for a new user name and/or password.
The system asks for a new user name and/or password.

FlowElement.Step: The system asks the Customer for the following information: name and address (mandatory), shipping address (optional), email address (mandatory), phone number (optional), fax number (optional), credit card details (mandatory)
The Customer enters the requested information.

WhileElement.Step: The sytem asks the Customer for the missing information.
The Customer enters the missing information.

FlowElement.Step: The system confirms that the customer information has been accepted.
The system assigns a unique customer identifier to the customer.

Postconditions.Postcondition: A new customer record has been created.
The Customer is assigned a user name and password.
The Customer is assigned a unique identifier.
